column5: I haven't decided if I want to join this club yet, just wondering if there are any members on this board?  Also, has anyone been to any of there events yet? If so how was it?  I have signed up for the tournament coming up on August 9th and I'm looking forward to it.  This club is perfect for someone like me, because I don't have a boat just yet!
Hmmm... sounds interesting.... Do they have a website? I'm a shore fisherman too...

It's a great Match, multi species, total weight. The members are great bunch of people, they give great advice and tips. The Matches are very well organized, and there are some great prizes. The venues are really good. Good luck on the 9th.
Thank you! I'm sure I will be scrounging for tips the week before hahaha!
